      • testXml

        protected void testXml(org.apache.geode.internal.cache.xmlcache.CacheCreation creation)
                throws java.io.IOException
        Uses the CacheXmlGenerator to generate an XML file from the given CacheCreation. It then creates a Cache from the XML and asserts that it is the same as the cache described in the CacheCreation.
